title: 8 "Sakons Puppet: The Ghost Chapter - Part I"(Japanese:「左近からくり変化の章」〜第二段〜) November 19, 1999(1999-11-19)
transformers_text: 8 Sakon s Puppet The Ghost Chapter Part I Japanese November 19 1999 1999 11 19 Uk on needs repairs so Sakon leaves the puppet with the craftsman Haya mi at Fu kami's puppetry workshop When Sakon returns to retrieve Uk on there is a gas explosion and fire in Haya mi's workshop and living quarters and Haya mi is burned to death
tf_idf_text: sakon puppet ghost chapter part japanese november need repair sakon leave puppet craftsman haya kamis puppetry workshop sakon return retrieve gas explosion fire haya mi workshop live quarter haya burn death
